website_summaries.verdict: A great looking cabinet with an adjustable shelf inside and useful lower slate effect shelf for quick access to products.
pros: Sturdy hardwood and plywood mix construction
Door can be installed to open left or right
Lightweight, durable, and easy to hang with supplied wall anchors
cons: Some users report installation holes drilled in wrong place

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT- Added some needed DIY!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I ended up doing some DIY. Instead of using the hooks that come with it, I went with wall anchors so it cal hold up to 100 pounds instead of the 30 recommended. I painted the front part (pictured) because it was just like machine cuts before, hard to explain. I just used white paint to fill in the lines & wiped it away! Holds so much! Will be purchasing another for my other bathrooms. I paid $30 for it. I see the price keeps fluctuating. If it goes any higher I might opt for something else but $30-$40 so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet with one exception
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a mistake when my contractor put it together and mounted it on the wall. The black "shelf" below the cabinet doors threw me for a loop (and I didn't notice it on the photo before I bought it). Not sure why the manufacturer would take a pristine white cabinet and add a black shelf. Makes no sense, and I don't like the way it looks at all. I'd return it but this piece went into a rental unit and I don't have time to switch it out! Oh well, maybe I'm the only one who would notice.
customer_reviews.author: Distracted Susan

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the bad reviews and bought this knowing the backing was thin and it is made of cheap materials. I am so glad I did because I love it! I don't think it looks cheap up on the wall and who cares what the backing is made of? It was easy to put together, you will need two people to attach it to the wall and put the cabinet door on but it took us about 10 minutes and the instructions were very clear and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Quick

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for bathrooms with limited storage or space.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is perfect for the space. It has a ton of room inside. Much better that some over the toilet rack. The material it''s made of is somewhat lightweight, which eliminates the worry of it falling off the wall or having to find some heavy duty materials to destroy my wall with. The color (white unit with gray shelf) is subtle, modern, and contemporary, and compliments the decor in the bathroom.This is a must-have for bathrooms with limited storage or space.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: For the price this was perfect. Looks solid and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Needed to update my small 1960s bathroom that was lacking storage. I had looked at over the toilet shelving and the quality was really crummy. For the price this was perfect. Looks solid and is sturdy. My husband actually enjoyed putting it together... said the instructions were very clear and everything was well labeled. He liked it so much he had me order the Cherry one (different style same mfg) and he's putting that one together now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for - a decently made cabinet that should last a while if taken care of.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a decent cabinet. Definitely takes some work getting the door straight, so if you aren't willing to play around with the hinge adjustment screws then this probably isn't the right product for you - look for something pre-built that you don't have to fiddle with. My unit came well packaged and had no damage, but since all of the pieces are some type of MDF, some units are bound to be damaged during shipping. Don't expect premium craftsmanship if you aren't paying for it. That being said, I got mine built and mounted in about two hours. Could've done it faster but I wasn't aiming to set any records.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So surprised at how long this little guy has lasted, especially considering the low price. It's been almost 4 years and we're still so happy with this purchase. Looks much classier than the over the toilet units that sit on the ground. Holds a decent amount of toiletries and the faux slate is actually really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cabinet. It's about half price of any comparable cabinet in a store and has plenty of room for bathroom supplies.
customer_reviews.author: TCM

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cabinet for the price. Looks great, easy to build and holds a good amount of products.
customer_reviews.author: birdie mommie

customer_reviews.title: decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: decent quality for the price, this is the usual big box put it together type of furniture. it wen together great. you need 1 stud as expected to mount to, you simply drill through 1 board into the stud with one, and utilize a drywall anchor for the second. The picture is a bit deceiving the panel on the door is actually cardboard with slots routed/cut in it, it is not wood. For the price I am not going to complain.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: The price and look of the cabinet is great, just be aware that it doesn't exactly come ...
customer_reviews.text: The price and look of the cabinet is great, just be aware that it doesn't exactly come with everything in order to mount it. It comes with two screws and ONE drywall anchor (they recommend drilling into a stud for the other screw. Where I wanted to place this in my bathroom I couldn't use one stud so had to go out for the other dry wall anchor. Another huge component is you yourself have to drill into the wood in order to make the holes for the screws you wish to mount it into. If you don't have a drill or aren't this handy I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelseydav

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet... minus the cardboard section on door
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cabinet... we needed something small for our master bathroom and didn't want to spend a ton of money on it (since no one ever sees it but us). This is the perfect size, shelves are adjustable, and assembly was easy enough. The only downside is that the middle section of the door is like a shiny cardboard piece... not the end of the world, but it definitely makes it look inexpensive. I'm going to look into covering that area with something to make it look nicer, because otherwise the cabinet is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: Great product for extra storage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cabinet if you need extra space and do not want to pay a lot of money for true extra space. Easy to put together. Arrived on a Sunday by the post office (!!!) and put together the same day. Instructions were easy to read. Don't expect the highest quality for this low rice, and you will be happy, too. For the great price, it is exactly what we were looking for -- a nice-looking product that offers the extra storage we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price but definitely looks (and wears) a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is OK as-is but my husband replaced the cheap, flimsy backerboard with a piece of beadboard and it looks much nicer. Be careful not to get the shelves wet or the cheap coating lifts away from the fiberboard underneath and the whole shelf gets warped. There are two shelves inside and they're surprisingly spacious- I keep bottles of hairspray, mousse, contact solution, etc. in here with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyEverythingonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Low-end shelf solution when you just need "something"
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about the quality are about right. Sure, it's under $50, but you can tell the door insert is cardboard when you're standing in front of it, and the backing still has a noticeable fold despite 12 nails. Other little things like they put all the white caps (to cover the black screws) in the same bag with those screws, so they're dingy. Be sure to use a phillips screwdriver and bit that fits perfectly or you'll get very frustrated--especially in the final steps. I had to use deck screws to hang it because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Sylvania

customer_reviews.title: A Flush Screw Is The Key
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cabinet for the price. The construction is decent. The only complaint so far is the cabinet did not ship with instructions. I had to assemble it based on the picture on the box, which really wasn't hard at all. One note to keep in mind while putting it all together - The screws on the outside should be flush with the exterior. I countersunk a few of mine and the little white clips that cover the screw head would not stay on until I backed the screw out a touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet looks very nice in my bathroom. Had no problems assembling it. Great price. Not too heavy. Adjustable shelf inside. Perfect depth for a bathroom cabinet.I am holding back one star for now because the white screw caps were filthy, and I am waiting to see if the supplier is going to send me new ones. UPDATE: supplier sent new screw caps. All set. Love the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: chunney

customer_reviews.title: Overall we like it
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to put together, easy to hang, a perfect size for bathroom items, 3 shelves and large door that can be put on to open either way. Cons: the little tabs that go over the screw holes don't fit right and keep falling off, the center of the door is just cardboard like the backing, the black shelf has some discoloration but nothing too noticeable. All in all we like it and are glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie L.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, we weren't expecting anything mind blowing. We were unexpectedly surprised! Yes, the door is made of particle board/borderline cardboard, but you can't really tell by looking at it. I would just suggest you be gentle when opening/closing the cabinet door. I thought the black shelf on the bottom was going to look weird, but it actually looks better in person than it does in the pictures. It's more of a dark grey marbled texture than solid black.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cabinet with a nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's bathroom to provide extra storage space so guests wouldn't see a cluttered countertop. Product arrived in a well packaged box. Was very easy to assemble and directions were easy to follow. Only took me about 30 minutes to put together by myself Cabinet has a sleek look that you would think costs more than this one. It also looks very nice above toilet and holds a lot of product. I also like that the door is straight and closes with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Eldred

customer_reviews.title: Classy cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: There is only one adjustable shelf inside the cabinet, so there are only two shelves in all. So we are using the cabinet for tall bottles, such as mouthwash, shaving cream, shampoo, and skin toner. The cabinet is quite large on the wall. I was surprised at how big it is. The cabinet looks classy in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great! Have had it for a few months and I am glad I put my money into this piece versus other wall cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cabinet - Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: This took only 25-30 minutes to put together and another 10 minutes or so to hang. I could have hung it faster but I wanted to make sure that I got it straight. It looks great in our bathroom. I was looking for a new cabinet but most of the ones that I found were too shallow and didn't offer enough shelf space. this one is great as the shelves are plenty deep You can make it swing open in either direction and the instructions show you how. Wonderful Item! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Great cabinet for a small bathroom. Goes well above toilet. Gives some extra storage without being bulky. It was very easy to assemble and install. The biggest con would be, in my opinion, the door does look a bit cheap. But I don’t care too much about my bathroom cabinet looking fancy, so it works well for us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered quickly and is a very good cabinet for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gtarp

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is a great value and looks amazing (not cheap) in our guest bathroom. Assembly was very easy, but it did take a little more effort to hang. I measured the distance of the studs above my toilet, and then drilled holes in the back of the cabinet accordingly. That made it much easier to hang and extremely sturdy where it is on the wall. The door has the faux bead board (made of thin particle board), which really isn't that noticeable and looks very, very nice. Always getting compliments!
customer_reviews.author: J M A

customer_reviews.title: Not a Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together. The front door panel is somewhat flimsy, but it serves the purpose. The screw covers are somewhat hard to get in place, so I didn't bother as I installed the cabinet in a narrow powder room so you can't​ really see the exposed screws where the cabinet is located and how it is positioned; lucky for me, I guess. Overall, not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Delta Hotel

customer_reviews.title: Classy Bathroom Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble at all assembling this cabinet. It has high-quality components, pre-drilled holes, perfect set of hardware, and nothing was missing. I just wish it had a small dowel at the bottom to hold a hand towel or wash cloth. I fastened it to a stud with supplied screws, and now it hangs above the toilet tank as shown, only a little higher. The hinges were VERY easy to install and they make the door snap shut when it becomes almost closed. My wife and I feel delighted with this product. It makes out bathroom look gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard??
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Your standard laminated particle board materials. Decent hinges. What I did NOT expect was the front panel to be made of cardboard! Not masonite, or hard-board. CARDBOARD! a thicker version of what you would discard for a dress shirt. True, it has a waxy coating to reduce moisture damage. but still. Cardboard? Even IKEA won't stoop so low.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent little cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install. The black shelve is too skinny though so the screws split it. I cut one out of real wood, a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: leozap

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's cheap Cons: It's cheap All in all a very decent unit. Came packaged very well. Standard flat-packed furniture; significant assembly required. One of the pre-drilled holes didn't quite line up correctly, but we were able to get it put together and hung on the wall without much difficulty. It's certainly not premium materials or finishes, but in this case you get what you pay for, and then some. As other reviewers have pointed out, the front panel is probably the weakest component here. "cardboard" might be a bit of an exaggeration, but at best it is composed of a very thin particle board. Once assembled and from a step or two away you're unlikely to ever notice though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hink

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is nice for the price! It's cheaper composite wood and paper. But it's made relatively well and was easy to put together. My only complaint is some of the screws did not fit flush and the white plastic covers did not seat properly. But, that was on the top where it really was not visible anyway. I needed a medicine cabinet that was easy to install without cutting a hole in the wall. This fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Chet Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: B+
customer_reviews.text: Quality Control! One Anchor was missing (the most important part in installation). I have plenty in my toolbox, but how about that person installing this at night when all the stores are closed? Item received as described and the quality is good. I’m not sure what all the bad reviews are for
customer_reviews.author: MPower-Project

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. You can have door open either way. Perfect for our newly remodeled bathroom. Good amount for storage too.
customer_reviews.author: rissluv5

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's not too bad. Yes the inner panel of the door IS ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's not too bad. Yes the inner panel of the door IS "cardboard". It's not the same "kind" of cardboard used in "cardboard boxes" (i.e. corrugated cardboard). It's thinner and harder, but it's cardboard nonetheless. That said, it hangs on the wall and sits there. the cardboard is not just suddenly gonna "break" unless you punch it or something. For the price, what do you expect? It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: It looks much cheaper than in the picture. The bead board panel on the front door is cardboard and the holes to attach the hinges were in the wrong place. If the cardboard panel had been wood instead I's have given this more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Smithoms

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great Value. Easy to assemble. I'm not a fan of the "slate" shelf on the bottom. Other than that it's sturdy and matches our bathroom beautifully. It's just deep enough for extra T.P.
customer_reviews.author: Regas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Getting it on the wall was tricky for me because I’m not used to doing things like that. But building it was exceptionally easy. I actually wanted one big tall cabinet but liked the style of this better so I paired it with the floor cabinet. It’s not like, expensive looking or anything but it matches our bathroom and provides ample storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ambergrrr

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cheap, and exactly the quality you would expect
customer_reviews.text: It's a very cute cabinet. The front panel is cardboard. the screw covers did not really stay on, so i might paint it later. i didn't expect it to be solid wood and I'm familiar with Sauder. was exactly what i expected. It's sturdy, but probably wouldn't survive being taken off and moved. It holds a bunch of stuff. I'm glad i ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: alexis w.

customer_reviews.title: The bad part is that it is assembled with screws that ...
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is a $20 cabinet that costs $40+. As others have pointed out, it is made of fiberboard, which at this price point is expected. The bad part is that it is assembled with screws that install from the outside of the cabinet instead of cam locks from the inside. These screws are then covered with white caps which do not fit properly into the screw heads. If you are expecting a clean exterior finish, this cabinet will not provide that. In addition the cabinet is poorly packed so the pieces can rub together. Thankfully on mine it was on the inside of the door, however it easily could have happened to the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than it should be for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a really nice cabinet, perfect for storing those necessary toiletry items that you want to have handy, but not necessarily on display. Has a nice, decorative, faux marble shelf at the bottom. The doors actually went on level on the 1st try! Sturdy construction. The center door panel is more on the cardboard side; but, if you're not a rough handling sort, this could last indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: CAJUN 2-STEP

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It made my small little bathroom more elegant. It is sturdy, has plenty of room and was actually very easy to put together. Only thing is that I wish it came with a better (or more) screws/posts to hang it. I had to get an extra one.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome cabinet. I have it hanging above my toilet ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cabinet. I have it hanging above my toilet in my guest bathroom. I have a lot of stuff in there including 2 tall sunscreen cans. It will fit a lot of bottles and misc things. That was the one thing I was concerned about, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: E L

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my master bath. I bought the matching full length for my guest bathroom. They make the bathrooms look so much better.
customer_reviews.author: M Camarillo

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, just need someone else to help you screw it into the wall. I had some trouble getting the door to hang straight but was able to figure it out. The front beadboard piece is made of the same hard cardboard material that the backing material is usually made of. Some reviewers were worried about water damage but I've had this product for several months and everything has held up fine. Overall, good product for the price - I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: CARDBOARD DOOR!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SO CHEAP! The wainscotting door itself is CARDBOARD! If I hadn't already assembled it, I'd be returning it and asking for a refund, its junk and a waste of $50!
customer_reviews.author: My Own Defender

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have this mounted above our toilet for extra storage. It's decent quality for the price and purpose. It was easy to assemble, though a bit tricky to mount to wall due to need to screw into studs (a mounting bracket would be nice).
customer_reviews.author: Kari M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet! It was simple to put together. The face lift to my very small bathroom was such an improvement from the old steel medicine cabinet over the sink. I purchase the cabinet and the mirror from Amazon and was pleased with the results!!
customer_reviews.author: Ang D

customer_reviews.title: Overall it was pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I think this product definitely reflects the cost and to me this is something that I use for a year or two and then I go get an upgrade. Mine doesn't sit flush with the wall and it is a little crooked, but thats what you paid for. Overall it was pretty easy to put together. I had a few pilot holes that were missing, but I have a drill so it was an easy fix. If you didn't I could see how that would be a major pain, but still fixable. And like I said, they only thing that really bugs me is mine doesn't sit flush with the wall so I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: swagers

customer_reviews.title: Not too big of a deal because the assembly is pretty easy to figure out
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the other reviews. First, I got it from Amazon Warehouse and it came without instructions. Not too big of a deal because the assembly is pretty easy to figure out. However, the door is literally a piece of cardboard. Why would you make something that is going to sit in a humid bathroom with such cheap materials? And for the price I paid!?! I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Dog Prof

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is kind of generic looking. Not so great quality. It is easy to put together though.
customer_reviews.author: david resenbeck

customer_reviews.title: It’s mire beautiful in person then your phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought for the In-laws and they put it in there kitchen for there medicine
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Feels Cheap and Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap feel to it and not at all sturdy. The bottom shelf also has a very poor "stone look" wallpaper covering. We will see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio T.

customer_reviews.title: Upside down necessity.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small narrow floor cabinet which I just couldn't find. Everything was too tal, too deep, etc. when I checked the measurement of this wall cabinet I realized it had the exact dimensions needed. I bought it, put it together (very easy). Turned it upside down and VOILA here is my small floor cabinet. Quality and price just right.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robba

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with what I got for the money that I paid. It is not the most heavy duty of cabinets but I am renting and not trying to drop serious money on upgrades that I will leave behind in a few years. This has more than enough space for my wife and I to store our bathroom vanity things. May even purchase a second one for our other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: ebersmash

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice cabinet, but a good example of getting what ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cabinet, but a good example of getting what you pay for. The front panel is obviously cardboard. Assembly was easy enough, and it's a functional piece with an inner shelf and exterior shelf. But no one would think this is all wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love the simple clean look of this cabinet! It was easy to assemble and takes two people to install, but adds a great amount of storage without taking too much space. Door can swing either way, too, which adds versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to put together and mount
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why everyone's being so negative here. It's an under 50 dollar purchase and that's exactly what you get. It's easy to put together and mount. It looks nice, but no it's not a luxury unit. You want a luxury unit, pay a luxury price. The storage is surprisingly spacious and I have not had any problems with the cardboard backing in the bathroom. It's a non-issue. Buy it if you need some decent, inexpensive bathroom storage. Don't buy it if you're remodeling your master bathroom. Suck it up and pay for something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and does the job. Was packaged well and went together easily. Slightly deeper shelves vs other comparable cabinets which helps with storage. Works well in our daughter's bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard beadboard
customer_reviews.text: Cute styling but cardboard furniture is unacceptable. I can't see this holding up in a bathroom plus it looked warped because it wasn't rigid. Too bad they couldn't make the beadboard out of something different.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pasillas

customer_reviews.title: The finish is dull and rough
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let other reviews fool you. This thing is built Even cheaper than the price is. The material is cheap and started to come apart as I put it together. The finish is dull and rough. The crappy white plastic caps for the screws were destroyed from being in the same packaging as the black screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This has opened up my main bathroom immensely! I had an over the toilet stand which just made it seem so tight in there. I love the door and it goes with the beadboard we have in our kitchen and are planning on putting in our bathroom as well. It has a lot of storage and I'm extremely pleased with the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M

customer_reviews.title: Usually Sauder is  fair quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Lighter wood than I expected. Disappointed in the quality. but is the right size for this small bathroom. Door opens easily and shelfs are easy, but really shallow. Not much can be stored and larger items past four inches will not fit. The white color does match the white commode.
customer_reviews.author: ELLIE

customer_reviews.title: Attractive storage unit...
customer_reviews.text: After reading several mixed reviews, I decided to take the chance and purchase the unit....and I have no regrets. The only thing I would change is the dark brown shelf. That's an easy fix. The unit looks very nice. Good improvement to our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Simple and inexpensive way to organize and declutter my bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple and inexpensive way to organize and declutter my bathroom. It's not the highest quality but I didn't expect that for the price. Installation instructions were adequate and all hardware was there. It is made of particle board so make sure you don't over tighten the screws.
customer_reviews.author: SPEEDYSHEED

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome. And so is the husband that assembled and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. And so is the husband that assembled and installed two of these for us in our new house. You can't buy my hubby on amazon, but you can buy this, so if you're in the market for a quality and large "over john" then this is the ticket for you. The finish is true white and the little shelf is really heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Mick

customer_reviews.title: AVOID!!! Terrible, dangerous product!!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE!!!! AVOID! It is really came crashing down in the middle of the night! It caused a ton of damage to our bathroom tiles as it fell, not to mention all of my makeup that was in the cabinet was shattered. A huge mess that you can avoid by buying another cabinet! We are lucky that no one was in the bathroom and got hurt!
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl1485

customer_reviews.title: Wood was warped.
customer_reviews.text: Want to start off by saying how I like the look of the cabinet. It works well in the bathroom. However, the wood was warped and wouldn't stay flush to the wall because of it. Additionally, the counter-sink holes for the door hinges were not placed evenly so the door is lopsided.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was perfect. There were extra precautions taken to ensure that the corners were protected, but it wasn't over the top. The construction instructions were great. Easy to understand, with a little bit of humor thrown in. We love our cabinet and will order a few more products from this vendor to complete our mini remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the final finish. Was a little difficult to mount on the wall in studs and anchors. Overall, satisfied. Quality is ok for the price that I paid!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my father in law for Father's Day for his new apartment which was lacking cabinets. It was easy to put together, seems sturdy and provided a good amount of storage for the bathroom. If you hang it a bit higher- you can even attach hooks or a small bar to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: C.D

customer_reviews.title: Once installed and looked at from a distance it looks nice. It did add much needed storage space in ...
customer_reviews.text: Build quality has much to be desired but i was using it in a rental house so the price is what i was more interested in. Once installed and looked at from a distance it looks nice. It did add much needed storage space in bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: johnstonjohnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install, its been functional. the only thing I don't love about it is the front panel-the grooves look they they were just pressed into cardboard which makes it look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: jademarie

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my space perfectly and also matches a small free standing cabinet that I bought previously. I would buy both items again. I am totally satisfied. My husband had it all together within an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Be aware: door is ugly, weak cardboard, not wood or even wood veneer slats
customer_reviews.text: I did not understand upon purchasing this that the door 'slats' are cardboard. It looks nice in the pix but ugly for real. Only saw it when my handyman had already installed it, so will keep it as it's not worth returning it, but wish that detail had been less concealed in product description.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is very cute and adds great extra storage to my small half bathroom. It assembled easily and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It was decently easy to assemble, although the drywall anchors aren't very good quality. Everything else is great, but there's not as much space as you might think.
customer_reviews.author: hardingbrandon32

customer_reviews.title: Probably can get better from Ikea
customer_reviews.text: I assembled them , hung the wall cabinet, took it off the wall a week later and listed them on Marketplace I built my own shelves with Cypress lumber. Better than the cheap cardboard and pressboard ones
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cottingham

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the little buttons that cover the screws were all dingy and scuffed up. They should've been in a separate bag from the rest of the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: girlie4zuz

customer_reviews.title: it's nice.. Worth the price anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The only think I should have been aware of is that there is no back to the shelf. The wall shows through. And, I had to cover up the hole in the wall from the old built-in medicine cabinet. So it's hung much lower than I would like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: JudyVB

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cabinet for a reasonable price. Easy to put together. And it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: J Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice addition to our half bath. We needed something to store toilet paper and such in and this does the job. It was easy to put together and easy to hang. It was inexpensive but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We love this in our guest bathroom for guests to put their overnight toiletries in. We also put toilet paper and bathroom spray in it. Love the way it looks! Perfect for us! :)
customer_reviews.author: RaeVent

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works & looks great. Yes, I would purchase another one if needed. I am using it in the guest bathroom so it is not opened or closed often. I am totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Super ugly. There are black screws which hold the ...
customer_reviews.text: Super ugly. There are black screws which hold the white cabinet together. Yes you can see the black screws on the sides of the cabinet. It's really an ugly cabinet. I used it since it was going in a rental unit.
customer_reviews.author: Holls82

customer_reviews.title: good addition to my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, and looks great in my newly-remodeled guest bathroom. Not too deep, which I wanted, so it doesn't protrude too much.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Ramos

customer_reviews.title: But it looks good in my bathroom and gave me some much needed ...
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are deceiving. The shelves are actually only 5.5 inches deep. The top of the unit is 7 inches deep. It's pressboard and cardboard. But it looks good in my bathroom and gave me some much needed extra storage space. It wasn't too hard to put together, although you do need two people for hanging the door and hanging the unit on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The face is made out of cardboard!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to open this and discover that the face is made out of cardboard rather than actual bead board. I can't imagine that it would survive long in a bathroom. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToLearn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Product was packed well, but pieces were not in good shape from factory. Screw covers were all filthy & damaged. Would be a great item for $20.00, but not for $50.00. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan d andrews

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The center textured piece is cardboard type material which I thought was weird for a bathroom piece of furniture. Other than that, it looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: oberg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Bathroom Wall Cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought 3 of the Cabinets and they look VERY nice in our bathroom and are SUPER EASY to put together. I'm happy I bought this because it hold ALL of my wife's lotions/sprays and what not in here. It has a lot of room!
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: What's worse is that it does not have the grooving of ...
customer_reviews.text: Risked order despite of reviews. The wainscoting panel is indeed fiberboard. What's worse is that it does not have the grooving of everyday wainscoting. It looks slightly better than if the grooves were created with a ball point pen.
customer_reviews.author: mtw

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs a bit improving
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet , easy to assemble but the depth of the side screws do not allow you to put those "CHEAP" buttons on to cover the screws
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet looks exactly like in the picture, the material could be a better quality maybe a little stronger, i gave it a 4 because when we drilled a screw the wood split i managed to cover it but i insist its too delicate and fragile al tho it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to a small bathroom that has a pedastal sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: This one is as good or better
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these from different companies now. This one is as good or better. Yes, like many of the comments, the backing is thin wood, but come on, it's against the wall. Do you need it thicker? It is against the wall! Buy it, you will like it
customer_reviews.author: Higdon

customer_reviews.title: not too bad for use in my private bathroom
customer_reviews.text: a little cheap looking, not too bad for use in my private bathroom, serves its purpose. I keep extra toilet paper in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: The CORRECT item is nice, as described
customer_reviews.text: Sauder sent the wrong cabinet (floor cabinet) initially, but was able to return (by having to go to UPS store) and re-order. The CORRECT item is nice, as described, and price was right!
customer_reviews.author: PhillyRN

customer_reviews.title: It looks attractive when up and I am very pleased with the product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly as described. It is wide enough to store extra medication and large bottle of lotion. It looks attractive when up and I am very pleased with the product for the price. Assembly was easy (done by my husband and his description. :)
customer_reviews.author: B Dunn

customer_reviews.title: It's really nice. Was pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice. Was pretty easy to put together. I have only one hand. The left side of my hand and fingers and wrist are paralyzed and I put together without any problems or help. Except hanging it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Carrillo-Mutchler

product_meta.title: Sauder Woodworking Caraway Wall Cabinet, Soft White finish
product_meta.description: Looking for a little extra storage in your bathroom? Get organized with this etagere from the Sauder Bath collection. This space-saving cabinet fits directly over your toilet and features cubbyhole storage, a frame panel door, and two adjustable shelves so you can neatly store all your bathroom necessities. It also includes a faux slate finished shelf and a bead board back panel. Finished in a sleek Soft White, this etagere will give your bathroom a fresh new look.
feature_bullets: Adjustable shelf behind frame and panel door with bead board insert
Reversible door opens left or right
Lower shelf features faux slate finish
Soft White finish with Slate finish accent

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars448 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
